column3: You cry and you scream and you stomp your feet and you shout. You say, 'You know what? I'm giving up, I don't care.' And then you go to bed and you wake up and it's a brand new day, and you pick yourself back up again.

All I wanted to do was get out of bed in the morning and walk to my office and sit back down in the chair.
